InformativeText.Abstract: This service exposes heart rate and other data from a Heart Rate Sensor intended for fitness applications.
InformativeText.Summary: The HEART RATE Service exposes heart rate and other data related to a heart rate sensor intended for fitness applications.

Dependencies.Dependency: This service is not dependent upon any other services.

GATTRequirements.Requirement: Mandatory if the Heart Rate Control Point characteristic is supported, otherwise excluded for this service.

ErrorCode.name: Heart Rate Control Point Not Supported

ErrorCodes.ErrorCode: Heart rate Control Point value not supported.

Characteristic.name: Heart Rate Measurement
Characteristic.InformativeText: This characteristic is used to send a heart rate measurement.

Characteristic.name: Body Sensor Location
Characteristic.InformativeText: The Body Sensor Location characteristic of the device is used to describe the intended location of the heart rate measurement for the device.

Characteristic.name: Heart Rate Control Point
Characteristic.InformativeText: The Heart Rate Control Point characteristic is used to enable a Client to write control points to a Server to control behavior. Note: This characteristic is conditional. The charactersitic is Mandatory if the Energy Expended feature is supported, otherwise excluded.
